item.title: Will Thom Tillis' opposition to Trump's megabill win over Senate GOP colleagues?
item.description: Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer said many Republicans agree with Tillis.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: Judge will instruct jury to continue deliberations
item.description: Hip-hop mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs is charged with sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Senate begins 'One Big Beautiful Bill' vote-a-rama

item.title: Supreme Court to hear Republican challenge to campaign spending limits
item.description: The Supreme Court on Monday said it will hear a Republican challenge to limits on federal campaign spending in its next term.
